title: CTRL0000061468 - Transcribed Interview of Bianca Gracia, (April 7, 2022)

data.text: JANUARY 6TH ATTACK ON THE U.S. CAPITOL,
The deposition in the above matter was held via Zoom, commencing at 9:58 a.m.
For the SELECT COMMITTEE TO INVESTIGATE

And so we're on the record at 9:58 a.m.
